page.t: xml2doc - Xml to Documentation format converter.

\fBXml2Doc\fP is a xml parser that allows you to generate documents writting them in an easy xml and output them to different formats (TXT,HTML,MAN,PDF,DocBook,LaTeX,...).
In a simple way it seems like DocBook concept, but in a more specific way. xml2doc is a lightweight program that converts an "xml2doc" document to other formats, without using other components like DocBook do with LaTeX.
To run xml2doc just run in conversion mode:
$ xml2doc -oP example.xml example.pdf
This will produce a PDF document from example.xml (xml2doc file).
